thread.title: Del Monte Goes Pink in Support of Safe & Sound 2015
thread.title_full: Del Monte Goes Pink in Support of Safe & Sound 2015 - CBS News 8 - San Diego, CA News Station - KFMB Channel 8

author: cbs8
title: Del Monte Goes Pink in Support of Safe & Sound 2015
text:
Del Monte
DUBAI , UAE, October 22, 2015 /PRNewswire/ --
For the 5 th year in a row, Del Monte® is an active sponsor of the Safe & Sound Burjuman Breast Cancer Awareness programme. Being one of the biggest and most comprehensive campaigns related to the cause, Safe & Sound already has a 15 year history. Over the years, the campaign has reached millions of women and families with the key message of 'early detection saves lives'.
(Logo: http://photos.prnewswire.com/prnh/20150203/728049-a )
(Photo: http://photos.prnewswire.com/prnh/20151020/278627 )
Throughout October, Del Monte® is playing a major role in the campaign with adverts on product packaging, social media, as well as spreading awareness among employees and business partners.
Youssef Zakharia, Del Monte® Vice-President, said: " We are proud to be sponsoring such an important cause. With our " Eat Healthy, Live Healthy " initiative, we support proper nutrition and healthy lifestyles that can help reduce the risk of cancer and other diseases. It seems natural f o r us to contribute to such a cause, as raising awareness of breast cancer early detection directly contributes to saving lives. "
This year, a special app has been created for the Safe & Sound Walkathon, whereby participants taking place will be able to track the progress of their walk/run. The app also gives the chance to support the cause by directly donating to Al Jalila Foundation and Breast Friends via the app's built-in payment gateway.
Del Monte® will be present at a major event at Kite Beach on October 30 th with the same objective of raising awareness. Support the cause by joining Del Monte®
About Fresh Del Monte Produce Inc.
Fresh Del Monte Produce Inc. is one of the world's leading vertically integrated producers, marketers and distributors of high-quality fresh and fresh-cut fruit and vegetables, as well as a leading producer and distributor of prepared food in Europe , Africa , the Middle East and the countries formerly part of the Soviet Union. Fresh Del Monte markets its products worldwide under the Del Monte® brand, a symbol of product innovation, quality, freshness and reliability for more than 100 years.
